hints.content:
To find how many building blocks Joanna got for her birthday, we can start with the $\purpleD{92}$ blocks she has now and subtract the $\blueE{63}$ building blocks she had.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1d093ef1015aa4a91361b95f68e577002b586d1e)

$\purpleD{92}-\blueE{63}= \maroonD{\Box}$

Let's subtract to find how many building blocks Joanna got for her birthday.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/f78ae863a8cd43edf26bae15a1841f44517645be)

$\purpleD{92}-\blueE{63}= \maroonD{29}$
Joanna got $\maroonD{29}$ building blocks for her birthday.

question.content:
Joanna had $63$ building blocks.  

She got more building blocks for her birthday.  Joanna now has $92$
 building blocks.  

**How many building blocks did Joanna get for her birthday?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] building blocks
